pros: Great nursing staff to work with here. Brand new emergency room which has all state of the art emergency equipment
cons: There was minimal pay increase for performance in this position. Some drama present in the ER that can sometimes hinder productivity.

Management.

Departments laid off with very little to no notice makes everyone nervous as Wellspan already laid off some paramedics already in York. And now an EMS department has been disbanded.

review_title: Great people work at Ephrata Hospital
pros: One of the best parts of working for Ephrata Hospital are the compassionate care givers working for the hospital. Some people give everything. These people can make things happen for great patient care.
cons: Some people came there to be comfortable. They have stayed too long. Therefore everything returns to way it use to be. They are non engaged especially after 6:00 PM Weekends and holidays.

review_title: Great people to work with. Pay is below industry standard.
pros: The people are great, Very friendly / caring
cons: Recently merged with Wellspan Health. Values do not match. Wellspan is much more the Big Corporate attitude and it is infecting Ephrata.
